module.name: Backup & Restore
module.description: Backup & Restore for your FreePBX environment
module.changelog: *16.0.7* FREEI-1765 typo error *16.0.6* Added custom files functionality code *16.0.5* Fixing FREEI-1710 Increasing legacy cdr restore timeout to 5 hours *16.0.4* FREEI-1567 logs created by new freepbxc 15 backup appear to be unmanaged *16.0.3* FREEI-1551 https setup not replicating to warm spare *16.0.2* Fixing FREEPBX-21456 Adding backup file under "backup job name" directory *16.0.1alpha* 16.0.1 alpha release
